item.title: The benefits of using a file for Log Parser SQL queries
item.description: With Log Parser, you can define your SQL query in a file, instead of on the command line.

item.title: Log Parser Plus - version 0.3 released
item.description: Version 0.3 BETA of Log Parser Plus (the application) is now available for download.

item.title: Log Parser Plus - version 0.2.1 released
item.description: Version 0.2.1 BETA of Log Parser Plus (the application) is now available for download.

item.title: Microsoft Log Parser custom brush for Syntax Highlighter
item.description: A custom Syntax Highlighter brush is now available for Microsoft Log Parser.

item.title: IIS Logs to SQLite - version 0.1 beta released
item.description: Built on Microsoft Log Parser, IIS Logs to SQLite aims to import IIS logs into SQLite databases.

item.title: Microsoft Log Parser timestamp formats
item.description: Timestamp formats supported by Microsoft Log Parser.

item.title: Parse FileZilla Server logs with Log Parser
item.description: SQL to run through Log Parser to parse and transform FileZilla Server logs into W3C Extended format.

item.title: How to get started with Microsoft Log Parser
item.description: The following guide will get you started with Log Parser.

item.title: LogParserPlus.com - Updates for 2008.11.04
item.description: LogParserPlus has been updated with expressions information, and descriptions for all functions.

item.title: LogParserPlus.com launched
item.description: Log Parser Plus now has content. Yay.

item.title: A brief overview of IIS 6.0 and the W3C extended log format
item.description: An overview of Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 6.0 and the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) extended log file format, in relation to Log Parser. [slnet0514:92218721-d037-4d0e-854e-fad30f247873]

item.title: Log Parser SQL query syntax (high-level)
item.description: A high-level look at the Log Parser's SQL syntax.

item.title: Log Parser script: Percent of status codes across all hits/requests
item.description: Log Parser SQL script to determine what percent status codes are across all requests.

item.title: How to ensure that performance counters continue after a restart
item.description: A possible way to have performance counters restart automatically after your box restarts. Also, an example LogParser query to analyze those logs.

item.title: Using Log Parser to find users accounts used to log into an FTP site
item.description: Query to find what user names were passed when logging into an IIS FTP site.
